topic.title: Download and install Gnu C Library (glibc) patch for Application Lifecycle Service

body.p: ALS images impacted by glibc are constrained to the constructor images. However updating the images is important to stay current. In order to update to the images with glibc fixed please update to 2.0.0.577.

ul.li: Updating follows the same steps as ALS installation found here: http://docs.hpcloud.com/#devplatform/2.0/installation/devplatform_install_ALS.html

body.p: The following two actions need to be taken for running components before update:

ol.li: Apply the latest security patches for the Ubuntu operating system of your ALS cluster nodes.
Apply the docker image update found here: http://docs.stackato.com/admin/best-practices/index.html#to-upgrade-the-docker-image
